amendment.description: Amendments en bloc printed in Part A of House Report 115-650 consisting of amendments numbered 102, 103, 105, 106, 109, 111, 113 and 116.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shuster amendments (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
